name: Class Sanctum
description: An ancient sanctum where adventurers can choose or change their class, or upgrade their existing class to an advanced form.

name: Ancient Treasure Vault
description: A legendary vault filled with priceless treasures. Can only be discovered using a Treasure Map.

name: Lost Mage Tower
description: A tower lost to time, containing powerful magical artifacts. Requires an Arcane Compass to locate.

name: Warrior Stronghold
description: An ancient warrior fortress filled with legendary weapons and armor. Only discoverable with a Battle Standard.

name: Rogue Hidden Cache
description: A secret cache hidden by master rogues. Only those with a Thieves' Map can find it.
